title: card.status Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

usb.description: `true`, if the Notecard is being powered by USB

storage.description: The percentage of storage in use on the Notecard

time.description: The UNIX Epoch Time of approximately when the Notecard was first powered up

connected.description: `true`, if the Notecard is connected to the Notehub

cell.description: `true`, if the Notecard has a cellular connection

gps.description: `true`, if Notecard's GPS module is currently powered on

wifi.description: `true`, if the Notecard's Wi-Fi radio is currently powered on

sync.description: `true`, if the Notecard is currently syncing with the Notehub

inbound.description: The effective inbound synchronization period being used by the device

outbound.description: The effective outbound synchronization period being used by the device

info: See [Configuring Synchronization Modes](notecard/notecard-walkthrough/essential-requests/#configuring-synchronization-modes) for details on how Notecard synchronization modes work regarding the `inbound` and `outbound` fields.
